description: A simple and easy to make salad that is filling either as a meal or snack.
name: Smoked Salmon Salad with Sesame Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: pinch salt (as needed to boil eggs)

recipeInstructions.text: Boil eggs from fridge, for 17-18 mins with some salt.
While eggs are boiling, chop vegetables.
Steam/boil corn kernels. (Or microwave to cook it)

When the timer for the eggs go off, immediately place them in cold water to stop cooking process for 2 mins. Peel the hard boiled eggs. You can chop them up into bite sized or chunky pieces or serve it whole on top of the salad (if serving individually).
In a bowl, combine the chopped veggies, smoked salmon pieces, cheese and egg.
Add sesame dressing and Greek yoghurt in equal portions.

Season the salad with pink salt & cracked pepper to taste (just before serving). Sprinkle garlic powder and/or onion powder, parsley & a dash of lime juice to the salad. Optional: pickled cucumber, capers, chilli flakes.
